content.text: Hi! I'm a chef and a student, so I cook and take music classes. What about you?
I hike and I'm in school for my bachelors! How do you like cooking?
Cooking is so much fun! I love creating new dishes and learning about different cultures through their food.
That's awesome! I'm more of a novice cook, but I love trying new foods. I'm looking forward to traveling the world and trying all the different cuisines.
That's so exciting! I've been lucky enough to travel a little bit and it's always so amazing to experience the food from different cultures.
I bet! I'm a little nervous about the whole flying thing, but I'm sure it will be worth it.
Flying can be a little scary, but it's so worth it to see all the amazing places in the world.
I'm sure you're right! I'm really excited to start planning my trips.
I'm sure you'll have a blast! Let me know if you have any questions about cooking or traveling.
